00027 OgrePCZFrustum.h  -  PCZ Supplemental Culling Frustum
00028 
00029 This isn't really a traditional "frustum", but more a collection of
00030 extra culling planes used by the PCZ Scene Manager for supplementing
00031 the camera culling and light zone culling by creating extra culling
00032 planes from visible portals.  Since portals are 4 sided, the extra 
00033 culling planes tend to form frustums (pyramids) but nothing in the 
00034 code really assumes that the culling planes are frustums.  They are
00035 just treated as planes.  
00036 
00037 The "originPlane" is a culling plane which passes through the origin
00038 point specified.  It is used to cull portals which are close to, but
00039 behind the camera view.  (the nature of the culling routine doesn't
00040 give correct results if you just use the "near" plane of the standard
00041 camera frustum (unless that near plane distance is 0.0, but that is
00042 highly not recommended for other reasons having to do with having a 
00043 legal view frustum).
00044 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 begin                : Mon May 29 2007
00046 author               : Eric Cha
00047 email                : ericc@xenopi.com
00048 Code Style Update    :
00049 
00050 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00051 */
00052 
00053 #ifndef PCZ_FRUSTUM_H
00054 #define PCZ_FRUSTUM_H
00055 
00056 #include "OgrePCPlane.h"
00057 #include "OgrePCZPrerequisites.h"
00058 #include "OgreFrustum.h"
00059 
00060 namespace Ogre
00061 {
00062     class PortalBase;
00063 
00064     typedef list< PCPlane * >::type PCPlaneList;
00065 
00069     class _OgrePCZPluginExport PCZFrustum 
00070     {
00071     public:
00072         // visibility types
00073         enum Visibility
00074         {
00075             NONE,
00076             PARTIAL,
00077             FULL
00078         };
00079 
00081         PCZFrustum();
00083         ~PCZFrustum();
00084 
00085         /* isVisible function for aabb */
00086         bool isVisible( const AxisAlignedBox &bound) const;
00087         /* isVisible function for sphere */
00088         bool isVisible( const Sphere &bound) const;
00089         /* isVisible() function for portals */
00090         bool isVisible(const PortalBase* portal) const;
00091         /* special function that returns true only when aabb fully fits inside the frustum. */
00092         bool isFullyVisible(const AxisAlignedBox& bound) const;
00093         /* special function that returns true only when sphere fully fits inside the frustum. */
00094         bool isFullyVisible(const Sphere& bound) const;
00095         /* special function that returns true only when portal fully fits inside the frustum. */
00096         bool isFullyVisible(const PortalBase* portal) const;
00097         /* more detailed check for visibility of an AABB */
00098         PCZFrustum::Visibility getVisibility(const AxisAlignedBox & bound);
00099 
00100         // calculate  culling planes from portal and Frustum 
00101         // origin and add to list of  culling planes
00102         int addPortalCullingPlanes(PortalBase* portal);
00103         // remove  culling planes created from the given portal
00104         void removePortalCullingPlanes(PortalBase* portal);
00105         // remove all  culling planes
00106         void removeAllCullingPlanes(void);
00107         // set the origin value
00108         void setOrigin(const Vector3 & newOrigin) {mOrigin = newOrigin;}
00109         // set the origin plane
00110         void setOriginPlane(const Vector3 &rkNormal, const Vector3 &rkPoint);
00111         // tell the frustum whether or not to use the originplane
00112         void setUseOriginPlane(bool yesno) {mUseOriginPlane = yesno;}
00113         // get an unused PCPlane from the CullingPlane Reservoir
00114         PCPlane * getUnusedCullingPlane(void);
00115 
00117         inline void setProjectionType(ProjectionType projType)
00118         { mProjType = projType; }
00120         inline ProjectionType getProjectionType() const
00121         { return mProjType; }
00122 
00123     protected:
00124         Vector3     mOrigin;
00125         Plane       mOriginPlane;
00126         bool        mUseOriginPlane;
00127         PCPlaneList mActiveCullingPlanes;
00128         PCPlaneList mCullingPlaneReservoir;
00129         ProjectionType mProjType;
00130 
00131     };
00132 
00133 }
00134 
00135 
00136 #endif
